Name: David
description:
David is 43 years old. He lives with his spouse and his 2 children in a rural village in the district of La Matanza, where the residents generally work in agriculture and raising domestic animals, located 4 hours from the city of Chiclayo.

For 7 years, David has made a living planting and growing beans, peas, and carob, which he then sells in his home. In addition, he works raising and selling farmyard animals.

He wants to invest in planting and growing yucca, and also in repairs to his home, which is where he sells his vegetables to provide greater security to his family and clientele. For this, he has requested a loan in the amount of 2,004 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

David is a hard-working, happy, and responsible man. His greatest desire is to provide a better quality of life to his family.
